main event: A witness reported observing an object shaped like a cone or tube of fire with brilliant blue-white lights moving at high speed and disappearing over the horizon on July 5, 1960.
interesting points: The object was seen at approximately 600 MPH and was estimated to be 3/4 mile high,The sighting lasted for 2.5 minutes with no known aircraft in the vicinity,The witness reported seeing similar disc-type objects in the area before,The conclusions indicated possibilities such as Balloon, Aircraft, or Astronomical,The report was part of the Project Blue Book investigation, which documents UFO sightings.
sighted object: object shaped like a cone or tube of fire with brilliant blue-white lights
witness description: A 44-year-old registered nurse who has had previous UFO sightings and takes the matter seriously.
